reviews.review: Классная игра, играли с другом на сильверах, а в конце узнали что против нас калаши и за нас беркуты. Хороший матчмейкинг
奥术大师大所多大所多

What I like with this game is that when you get really good at it, you get a feeling of mastery when you get cool kills from different angles and spots around the different maps. The eye and hand cordination and rapid eye movement is really fun to get good at.

What i dont like about this game is gamers that are rude ass hell for noe apperent reason. And on the Dust 2 map i really dislike the callout name on the T-Spawn side when you drop down to look down at double doors at mid. I dont think suicide is the right name for it, please find a new name for that because i dont wana yell Suicide whenever I cross over to the B-site when playing as a CT.  xD
this bullshit won't let me open the game. 100% recommend, very fun!

As a person who is new to not only csgo but pc gaming as a hole, I would highly recommend this game. Although the game has a big learning curve it is very fun to play. Picking it up and my first day or two of playing i had a great time.

Muito mau, um desenvolvedor que dever ter aprendido com a Take2 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Só lhes interessa dinheiro e à se o jogo der dinheiro eles nao mexem um palha para melhorar. 1º cheats e a carrada deles que nos impede de divertir! 2º Bugs e mais bugs e no final só janto bugs. que merda de se fazer com o publico que investe o seu próprio dinheiro tanto no jogo como nas caixas que nao sai nada. Resumindo só ainda jogo porque este consegue ser o unico jogo que fico frustrado a soltar a frustração.... Ai valve se tu nao és uma desenvolvedora de jogos que se tornou irrelevante. e que só sabe esconder os cheats da liga proficional!!! Mas bom é vida.
Я потерял в ней свою жизнь, и ни капельки не жалею

Sometimes I think this game is good, but then i wake up to the reality. Nothing ever goes as planned in this accursed world. The longer you live, the more you realize that the only things that truly exist in this reality are merely pain, suffering and futility.

P.s Games not so bad.
